title: Jack White Adds Winter 2025 European Dates to No Name Tour
description: The musician will take the stage in France, the Netherlands, England, and Scotland
author: Matthew Strauss
excerpt: The musician will take the stage in France, the Netherlands, England, and Scotland
text: Jack White is adding more stops to his recently announced No Name Tour. The new shows take place in France, the Netherlands, England, and Scotland in the winter. See all of White’s upcoming tour dates below.White spent the summer and autumn playing concerts in support of No Name, but he was announcing the shows without a great deal of warning or promotion. “We won’t really be announcing dates in advance so much, we will mostly be playing at small clubs, back yard fetes, and a few festivals here and there to help pay for expenses,” the musician wrote in August. “Shows will be announced as close to the show date as possible, some shows we won’t even decide to do until that morning. I also want to walk through orchard fields and grab apples off of trees at will and fill my belly full of that fruit if the desire strikes me. I’m looking for that cool breeze you know?”All products featured on Pitchfork are independently selected by our editors. html:
Jack White is adding more stops to his recently announced No Name Tour. The new shows take place in France, the Netherlands, England, and Scotland in the winter. See all of White’s upcoming tour dates below.

White spent the summer and autumn playing concerts in support of No Name, but he was announcing the shows without a great deal of warning or promotion. “We won’t really be announcing dates in advance so much, we will mostly be playing at small clubs, back yard fetes, and a few festivals here and there to help pay for expenses,” the musician wrote in August. “Shows will be announced as close to the show date as possible, some shows we won’t even decide to do until that morning. I also want to walk through orchard fields and grab apples off of trees at will and fill my belly full of that fruit if the desire strikes me. I’m looking for that cool breeze you know?”

All products featured on Pitchfork are independently selected by our editors. However, when you buy something through our retail links, we may earn an affiliate commission.

Jack White: No Name Tour 2024-2025
